about_the_game:
Play as Snow, a legendary warrior princess armed with her mother’s weapon, 'Icebreaker', and a time-reverting device, 'the Antikythera', in this strategic dungeon RPG. The fate of the world of Ouranos hangs in the balance—its destruction is imminent in just 3 days. But there’s hope: you can save Ouranos by collecting Angelic Power Sources from 3 unique dungeons.

Each day, you must select one dungeon to tackle. Each passing day the dungeons gain new mechanics and within the dungeons, everything costs time.

You’ll need to master your fighting class, leverage the Antikythera’s powerful rewind mechanic, and carefully manage your resources to uncover the most efficient strategies and conquer each dungeon in time.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent killing of both creatures and humans in combat. Implied heavy violence through sound effects and descriptions "broken limbs",  "gouged eyes", "choking". Corpse gore in the overworld such as decapitations, implied spine ripping, and corpse kicking. Scenes of impalement, poisoning, and falling to death. Sound only game over scenes that implicate intense violence.

detailed_description:
Play as Snow, a legendary warrior princess armed with her mother’s weapon, 'Icebreaker', and a time-reverting device, 'the Antikythera', in this strategic dungeon RPG. The fate of the world of Ouranos hangs in the balance—its destruction is imminent in just 3 days. But there’s hope: you can save Ouranos by collecting Angelic Power Sources from 3 unique dungeons.

Each day, you must select one dungeon to tackle. Each passing day the dungeons gain new mechanics and within the dungeons, everything costs time.

You’ll need to master your fighting class, leverage the Antikythera’s powerful rewind mechanic, and carefully manage your resources to uncover the most efficient strategies and conquer each dungeon in time.
name: Princess of Frozen Flowers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A8-3850
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 5-3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No VR

short_description: 3 dungeons, 3 days, 3 power sources. Princess of Frozen Flowers is a time management dungeon RPG where you are tasked with finishing each dungeon on time as each day gets increasingly more difficult.
